# Checking Temporal Sampling Frequency

How often are checklists recorded in each grid cell?

## Load libraries

```{r}
# load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)

# for plotting
library(ggplot2)
library(scico)
```

## Load checklist data

```{r}
# load checklist data
data = read_csv("data/03_data-covars-perChklist.csv")

# transform to UTM 43N
data = st_as_sf(data, coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)
data = st_transform(data, crs = 32643)

# get coordinates and bind to data
data = cbind(st_drop_geometry(data),
             st_coordinates(data))

# bin to 1000m
data = mutate(data,
              X = plyr::round_any(X, 1000),
              Y = plyr::round_any(Y, 1000))
```
